$background 0.6 0.5 0.5

$camera 0 0 -64  1 1 1           0 0 0   45      0.05 10000 

#$tri 10 0 -10 -10 0 -10 10 0 10 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 	0 	0 1 1 0 DIFFUSE
#$tri 10 0 -10 -10 0 -10 10 0 10 0 6 0 1 1 1 45 	45 	0 0 1 0 DIFFUSE
#$tri 10 0 10 -10 0 -10  -10 0 10  0 0 0 1 1 1 0   0   0 1 1 1 DIFFUSE


#Box Ceiling
$tri 11.813861 23.685257 11.813861 -11.813861 23.685257 11.813861 11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 2 4 DIFFUSE
$tri 11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 -11.813861 23.685257 11.813861 -11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 2 4 DIFFUSE

#Box Floor
$tri 11.813861 0 -11.813861 -11.813861 0 -11.813861 11.813861 0 11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 1 DIFFUSE
$tri 11.813861 0 11.813861 -11.813861 0 -11.813861 -11.813861 0 11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 1 DIFFUSE

#Box Back
$tri -11.813861 0 		-11.813861 11.813861 0 -11.813861 -11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 1 DIFFUSE
$tri -11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 11.813861 0 -11.813861 11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 1 DIFFUSE

#Box Front
#$tri -11.813861 0         -11.813861 11.813861 0 -11.813861 -11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 1 DIFFUSE
#$tri -11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 11.813861 0 -11.813861  11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 1 DIFFUSE

# Box Left
$tri 11.813861 0 11.813861 11.813861 23.685257 11.813861 11.813861 0 -11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 2 EMISSIVE
$tri 11.813861 0 -11.813861 11.813861 23.685257 11.813861 11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 2  EMISSIVE

# Box Right
$tri -11.813861 23.685257 11.813861 -11.813861 0 11.813861 -11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 2 1 EMISSIVE
$tri -11.813861 23.685257 -11.813861 -11.813861 0 11.813861 -11.813861 0 -11.813861 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 2 1 EMISSIVE

#$tri -4.885878 11.688869 -4.176740 -0.736424 -0.124988 0.027292 -4.885872 -0.124990 -4.176740 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 1 DIFFUSE

#$tri 1.197891 -0.124992 8.523905 1.197887 4.565423 8.523905 2.579140 -0.124993 2.780741 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 1 DIFFUSE
#$tri 2.579140 -0.124993 2.780741 1.197887 4.565423 8.523905 2.579136 4.565422 2.780741 0 0 0 1 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 1 DIFFUSE

$sphere -2 1 0    4 4 4     	0 0 0   1 0.5 0.5 	DIFFUSE
$sphere 2 1 1    4 6 5     	0 0 0   0.5 0.5 0.5 DIFFUSE
